sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 24, 2026 –

The trail will be groomed today for classic and skate skiing. The connector trail from the ski center to Bucks Run is no longer available.  Please know that you will have to walk to the start of the trail.  For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Deep tracks,somewhat icy. Skin skis worked great. Skate lane looked fast and fine. There 's no trail to Bucks run. Suggest walking but be careful of the ice.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Outstanding today - perfect groom over 28” hardpack , blue sky , sweet spot timing between 10:30 and 12:30 - simply wonderful!

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were packed on Monday, conditions are very good.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Night Skiing is Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: It continues to be a winter wonderland at Nub's Nob. The snow is machine groomed and in exceptional shape thanks to the cold and fresh snow this week. Today starts off cold, but the temperature should climb with a high in the mid-20's. We are under a Winter Weather Advisory beginning at noon today. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches are anticipated. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is Chicken Pot Pie. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
